short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Brings a moment of calm to your browser with a stunning sunset scene.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This background showcases a lone figure standing at the edge of a reflective lake, their silhouette blending with the pastel skies as birds soar overhead. The soft pink, purple, and golden hues create a tranquil ambiance, offering users a serene escape each time they open a new tab. The sky mirrors beautifully on the water below, symbolizing stillness and peace, perfect for those who appreciate quiet moments of reflection and beauty.
